original: Claesson, Olof Gustaf, kyrkoherde, Grohed, f. 26/3/79 i Gunnarsjö, Älvsb. 1., av kyrkoh. J. G. C. o. Chadotte Österberg. G. 11 m. Gertrud Ekberg. Barn: Margareta f. 13, musikdir., Härnösand, Ingrid 16, diistr rsköter-ska, Ljunigskile, Gunnar 24, ing., Gbg. — Mog:ex. i Gbg 98, teol. fil. ex. 00, teor. teol. ex. 02, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 03. Missiv i Bollebygd, Halmstad, Mölnda’1, Rönnäng, Forshälla o. Rom-mele, past:adj. o. las :pred. i Uddevalla 08, kommin. i Tölö 11, kyrkoh. i Forshälla sed. 25. Ordf. i kyrkostämmor. LVO.
translated: Claesson, Olof Gustaf, vicar, Grohed, b. March 26th, 1879 in Gunnarsjö, Älvsb. County, son of vicar J.G.C. and Chadotte Österberg. Married for 11 years to Gertrud Ekberg. Children: Margareta b. 1913, music director in Härnösand, Ingrid b. 1916, district nurse in Ljungskile, Gunnar b. 1924, engineer in Gothenburg. Completed secondary education in Gothenburg in 1898, obtained a degree in theology in 1900, a degree in theoretical theology in 1902, and was ordained as a priest in the Gothenburg Diocese in 1903. Worked as a curate in Bollebygd, Halmstad, Mölndal, Rönnäng, Forshälla, and Rommele, assistant vicar and lay preacher in Uddevalla in 1908, parish priest in Tölö in 1911, and vicar in Forshälla since 1925. Chairman of church meetings. Awarded the Order of the Polar Star.
